bibl.title: Greek Anthologies on Papyrus and their Readers in Early Ptolemaic Egypt.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: 1. Starting points and terms. - 2. P. Stras. Inv. W.G. 307 (= M.-P.3 426; LDAB 1051). Provenance [al-Hiba]. - 3. Links: Strasbourg to Hamburg. - 4. bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007
